summary: The diff adds a new PortfolioVideoGallery component and integrates it into AboutContactPage as a new Videos section below MediaPortraits. Most core requirements appear implemented (static HTML5 videos, responsive grid, no autoplay, aspect-ratio reserved). One acceptance criterion around a poster-missing fallback placeholder is not clearly satisfied based on the current overlay behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: If a poster image is specified for a video entry, it is applied to the <video> element; otherwise a styled fallback placeholder is shown.
missing_requirements.reason: The component passes `poster={video.poster}`, but all listed video items omit `poster`, and the only 'fallback placeholder overlay' is always present and is set to `opacity-0` (only becomes visible on hover). There is no conditional UI that clearly shows a placeholder when `poster` is not provided / before the video loads.
